Package ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.test

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdventureApplicationTest
    Tests the AdventureCreator the custom application object we wrote for the application The application is used to as a static singleton throughout in which it can return other singletons (mostly controllers and helpers) Adventure Application contains: StoryController,FragmentController,StoryList,StoryListController,OfflineIOHelper,OnlineHelper
    BuildConfig  
    CacheStoryTestCases  
    ChoiceEditActivityTestCases
    This class will test that the widgets in the ChoiceEditActivity are correctly initialized and can be edited There are two widgets on the screen, on editText and also a button
    ChoiceTest
    These test cases test that all getters and setters of the Choice class work correctly, because there are no methods other than getters and setters associated with the choice class thats all we test We test if all fields choiceText, linkedToFragmentPos, and isRandom behave correctly
    DownloadTasksTestCases
    These test cases test the functionality of the Download AysncTasks, the DownloadStoryTask and the DownloadTitleAuthorTask.
    They work by downloading the object from the server, assuming that it exists and then performing some checks on the downloaded object.
    EditStoryActivityTestCases  
    FragmentControllerTest
    Tests the functions of the FragmentController class
    FragmentEditActivityTestCases  
    FragmentPartTest
    Tests the functions of the FragmentPart class
    FragmentTest
    Tests the functions of the Fragment class
    FragmentViewActivityTest
    Tests for the fragment view activity These tests should cover all tests in use case 1 These tests ensure that the FragmentViewActivity properly displays fragments in a story
    MainActivityTestCases  
    OfflineIOHelperTest
    This class tests the OffLineIOHelper As the Offline helper only contains two methods besides the constructor we test those Those methods are the loadOfflineStories and also the saveOffLineStories which we test with one test case to ensure that loading/saving with file io works properly
    OnlineHelperTest  
    PublishTaskTestCases
    These test cases test the tasks of the online to offline and vice versa implements.
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.drawable  
    R.string  
    StoryControllerTest
    These test cases test that all getters and setters in the Story Controller class work properly.
    StoryFragmentControllerTestCases
    Tests the Story Fragment Controller functionality to see if all fragment related processes will function properly.
    StoryListControllerTestCases
    These test cases test that the StoryList controller behave to meet the needed requirements.
    StoryListTest
    This set of test cases will test that our StoryList methods all behave as intended The methods that will be tested are getAllStories,setAllStories,addStory, and getStoryAtPos The storyList is a collection of stories that we have made a class for From the storyList you will be able to access all stories that have been loaded into it
    StoryTest  
    TaskTestCases
    These test cases test the tasks of the online to offline and vice versa implements.
